title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 55.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 55.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Policyholder shall have the meaning set forth in Labor Law, section 217(2)(a). (b) Certificate holder shall have the meaning set forth in Labor Law, section 217(2)(b). (c) Terminate or termination shall mean nonrenew or cancel. (d) Group accident insurance policy, group health insurance policy and group accident and health insurance policy shall have the meanings set forth in subsection (a) of Insurance Law section 4235 (group accident and health insurance defined). Notes

York State Register June 9, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 23, eff. 6/9/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
